ingredients.ingredient: 5 slices bread, crusts removed and broken into crumbs

cookingTips: Soften butter at room temperature for easier mixing
Remove bread crusts to create finer crumbs and smoother texture
Don't drain pineapple - the juice keeps the casserole moist and sweet
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This Hawaiian-style side dish works well with ham or pork. Do you prefer it denser or more custardy? Would you like suggestions for complementary dishes?
